remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在 物件上實作 介面，將有關端點功能或需求的陳述式寫入由特定端點所公開的 WSDL 資訊中。Implement the interface on a object to write statements about endpoint capabilities or requirements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular endpoint. 一般而言，繫結項目是實作某種功能的項目，但這不是必要的。Typically the binding element is one that implements some feature, but this is not required. 如果要從組態檔載入您的原則匯出工具，請實作會傳回原則匯出工具 物件的 。To load your policy exporter from a configuration file, implement a that returns the policy exporter object. 原則匯出工具是由 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 所使用，以使用原則判斷提示針對該自訂繫結需求或端點功能的存在與用戶端進行通訊。The policy exporter is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] to use policy assertions to communicate to clients the existence of that custom binding requirement or endpoint capability. 方法採用 和 物件。The method takes the and objects. 您可以使用 、 和 方法，取得已經在各種範圍匯出的原則判斷提示的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 然後將您的自訂原則判斷提示物件加入至適當的集合。Then add your custom policy assertion object to the appropriate collection. 屬性會公開正在匯出的端點的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 這可讓 延伸正確限定其匯出原則判斷提示的範圍。This allows the extension to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，程式碼中的安全性屬性可能會將行為加入至 ，指出應在何處加入安全性原則判斷提示。For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 機制僅支援以 WSDL 匯出原則判斷提示。The mechanism only supports exporting policy assertions in WSDL. 如果要匯出自訂 WSDL 項目，您必須使用 機制直接修改 WSDL。To export custom WSDL elements you must use the mechanism to modify the WSDL directly. 在自訂原則判斷提示附加至 WSDL 資訊之後，用戶端就可以使用 物件來偵測及匯入自訂繫結判斷提示。Once custom policy assertions have been attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by using an object. ##
